content.rendered:
Gee By DL Davies

Author D. L. Davies pens a story of a young boy named G.E.E. and his ventures in life

YORBALINDA, CALIFORNIA, USA, May 3, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — The main character of Davies’ world, George Elandier “Gee” Evansen, is an innocent 10-year-old boy who lives in the wreckage of his city. Gee has a set daily schedule and only leaves the house to find food and other necessities for his family to survive the day. He makes an effort to look for items that he may trade or sell for food. All the while extending a helpful hand to other people along the way while doing so.

One tragic day, Gee was chased by murderous criminals and gradually lost his family to cannibals. Torn by loss and searching while on the lookout for the people who want to capture him, he discovers the ability that will redirect his faith. The irony of the story is that while people are making destructive weapons, they are also making things better by rebuilding. As they continue to read the book, readers will learn how their present choices will affect their future.

Author D L Davies, wrote a powerful and compelling story for this book. D L Davies is a Caucasian American-Indian writer with an amazing memory. He explained that he loved books long before he could read them, creating fictional stories based on images, which sparked his interest in books that open doors to endless possibilities. In addition to photography, fishing, hiking, and other outdoor activities, Davies admits that writing is his favorite hobby.

Grab copies of D L Davies’ “Gee” on Amazon and other leading digital bookstores worldwide. To know more about Davies works visit his website at dldaviescuauhtemoc.com.

About Inks & Bindings:

Launching brilliant stars into the spotlight! Inks & Bindings is set to broaden horizons, revamp to perfection, and produce a masterpiece through the power of books.

Inks and Bindings is a premier self-publishing company located at the heart of the Golden State. Aptly based where fashion, entertainment, and culture thrive, the team goes all out in bringing independent authors into the sweet California spotlight.

JORELOU GABATO
Inks and Bindings, LLC
